In England, in the seven days to 06 January, there were 1,015,621 new confirmed cases (1,796.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 30 December, there were 913,496 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 11% (102,125 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 11 January is 12,469,614 (22,050.5 cases per 100,000 population).
